title: IDK WHERE IS MY WARD SKIN PLS I NEED HELP I LOVE THAT WARDSKIN PLS PLS PLS PLS PLS
body:
when tristanas dragon skin went out i bought with a ward and today i cant use it i dont know why bur in the store pops that i already bought it
i cant use it pls i need help i have screen shots to prove it that appears in the store but not in my ward skins list 
how i can upload pics here?
AND PLS PLS PLS PLS PLS PLS PLS HELP ME PLS

replies.body:
We're aware of an issue where certain ward skins aren't showing up on either your Summoner Profile nor in champ select. This is a visual bug, so you still own the ward, you just cannot select it. We're working on a fix, but I don't have a timeline on when that will roll out.

Let me know if you have any questions.
